settings.title_1: Can I cancel or edit my order?
settings.answer_1:
Please send an email to hello@xpandlaces.com with the subject line “Cancel/Edit My Order” and include your the order confirmation number (starting with a B#####).

Unfortunately we are unable to provide guarantees that we can edit/cancel your order prior to the item being sent out, but we'll do our very best to help! Please understand that if we're unable to manually intercept your order prior to it leaving our facility, the responsibility of returning the items for a refund or exchange will be subjected to our regular Returns & Exchanges Policy.
settings.title_2: Do you offer refunds or exchanges?
settings.answer_2:
We love the products we make and think you will, too. If you don’t enjoy your first package from Xpand, let us know so that we can help you return or exchange your products within 90 days of receipt for a full refund.

Please note that shipping fees are non-refundable and orders that took advantage of free shipping will be refunded the amount minus the cost of standard shipping.

Please reach out to hello@xpandlaces.com with any questions you may have!
settings.answer_3:
All Xpand products have a 90-day satisfaction guarantee.

If you’re unsatisfied with your Xpand products within this period, we will accept a return and help process a refund.
settings.answer_4:
We ship all orders within one to two business days.

USA:

  • Standard Shipping: 3 - 7 business days average
  • Expedited Shipping: 2 - 5 business days average
  • Priority Shipping: 2 - 4 business days average


Canada:

  • Standard Shipping: 3 - 7 business days average
  • Expedited Shipping: 3 - 5 business days average
  • Express Shipping: 1 - 3 business days average

settings.answer_1:
Free Shipping on orders $30 and more.

For orders under $30:

  • USA: $4.99 - $6.99
  • Canada: $8.99 - $10.99
  • INTL: varies by location. See rate at checkout
settings.answer_2:
If you don’t enjoy your first package from Xpand, let us know so that we can help you return or exchange your products within 90 days of receipt for a full refund.

Please note that shipping fees are non-refundable and orders that took advantage of free shipping will be refunded the amount minus the cost of standard shipping.

Please reach out to hello@xpandlaces.com with any questions you may have!
settings.title_3: How can I track my order
settings.answer_3:
USA orders:

  • For stardard, expedited and priority , enter your tracking number here.
  • For DHL Express USA orders, enter your tracking number here.

For Canada orders, enter your tracking number here.

For INTL orders, enter your tracking number here.

Please note that it often takes the service carrier 24-48 hours to scan a package and then update the tracking information within their system. Rest assured that your order has shipped and is on its way to you! You should be able to see an update within 2 business days of shipment.
settings.title_4: How long will it take to get my package?
settings.answer_4:
We ship all orders within one to two business days.

USA:

  • Standard Shipping: 3 - 7 business days average
  • Expedited Shipping: 2 - 5 business days average
  • Priority Shipping: 2 - 4 business days average


Canada:

  • Standard Shipping: 3 - 7 business days average
  • Expedited Shipping: 3 - 5 business days average
  • Express Shipping: 1 - 3 business days average
settings.answer_5:
Yes!

For the USA & Canada, we offer express shipping options for $19.99 regardless of the size of your order. This allows for you to receive your package 1-3 business days after it is shipped.

Shipping cost are are non-refundable.
settings.answer_6:
Yes!

If you need to exchange an item, send us an email at hello@xpandlaces.com and we’ll be happy to help start the process. Items returned for exchange purposes must include the "Return/Exchange Form” inside the returning package in order for our time to process your request in a timely manner.

Xpand will reship the new item at no extra shipping cost. However, the customer is responsible for paying shipping costs for the item(s) that is to be exchanged.

Please note that exchanging will void the return policy.

settings.title_1: What is the difference between flat and round laces?
settings.answer_2: Absolutely! Xpand Lacing System is designed to stretch and be trimmed, which allows it to fit all types of shoes. For this reason, Xpand Laces can work on shoes from kid's shoes to adult boots. For more detailed instructions, see our installation page.
settings.answer_3: Finding the perfect fit is easy with Xpand Laces, as long as you don't trim them too short initially. We recommend testing the length before you make any cuts, and always set the initial adjustment on the loose side, so that you can always tighten them up if needed.
settings.title_4: What are the lengths of the Xpand laces?
settings.answer_4: Xpand Laces are 52 inches long, and can stretch out to over twice that length, which makes them long enough for both high tops, Jordans and boots.

settings.faq_title: Can I still shop online during COVID-19?
settings.faq_body: We are continuing to process orders with no disruptions so you can expect standard delivery times as shown here.

settings.faq_title: Will Xpand Laces fit high-tops, boots and kids' shoes?
settings.faq_body: Absolutely! Xpand Lacing System is designed to stretch and be trimmed, which allows it to fit all types of shoes. For this reason, Xpand Laces can work on shoes from kid's shoes to adult boots. For more detailed instructions, see our installation page.

settings.faq_title: Are Xpand Laces adjustable after I trim them?
settings.faq_body: Finding the perfect fit is easy with Xpand Laces, as long as you don't trim them too short initially. We recommend testing the length before you make any cuts, and always set the initial adjustment on the loose side, so that you can always tighten them up if needed.

settings.faq_title: What are lengths of the Xpand shoelaces?
settings.faq_body: Xpand Laces are 52 inches long, and can stretch out to over twice that length, which makes them long enough for both high tops, Jordans and boots.

settings.faq_title: Can I use Xpand® Lacing System for running and other sports?
settings.faq_body: Many of our satisfied customers choose Xpand Laces to meet their athletic needs. Depending on the demands of your sport, the tension can be adjusted to provide enough support and comfort. But remember that any shoelace worn too loose can result in a rolled ankle.
Xpand offers a 90 day money back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with your order for any reason in the first 90 days, we will refund your order - no questions asked.
